name: Eye for an Eye
description:
The scoreboard only works with this version: https://www.scirra.com/arcade/action-games/eye-for-an-eye-38470

"Eye for an Eye" is a short steampunk roguelike where each time you defeat an enemy your attack, speed or health is increased. It took me 6 days to complete. 

AntiqueGearGames.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GearAntique
